items.title: Student-athlete: Commanders LB Bobby Wagner graduating with MBA from Howard University
items.description: The Washington Commanders linebacker received his MBA from the historically Black university while being a fully active player.

items.title: WNBPA members vote to strike 'when necessary'
items.description: The WNBPA announced Thursday that its members have voted overwhelmingly to authorize calling a strike "when necessary" during the ongoing negotiations...

items.title: Ex-NASCAR driver Biffle, family die in plane crash
items.description: Former NASCAR driver Greg Biffle, his family and three others were among seven people killed in a plane crash Thursday in Statesville, N.C.
